39 class IPublisher
40 {
41 public:
43 
45  virtual void publish(std_msgs::Int32 msg) = 0;
46 };
47 
49 class PublisherProxy : public IPublisher
50 {
52  std::shared_ptr<ros::Publisher> publisher_;
53 
54 public:
56 
58  PublisherProxy(std::shared_ptr<ros::Publisher> publisher)
59  {
60  publisher_ = publisher;
61  }
62 
64 
66  virtual void publish(std_msgs::Int32 msg)
67  {
68  publisher_->publish(msg);
69  }
70 };
71

117 
119 class RosProxy : public IRosProxy
120 {
122  ros::NodeHandle node_handle_;
124  std::vector<ros::ServiceServer> services_;
125 
126 public:
128 
130  std::shared_ptr<IPublisher> advertise(std::string path)
131  {
132  return std::shared_ptr<IPublisher>(new PublisherProxy(
133  std::shared_ptr<ros::Publisher>(new ros::Publisher(node_handle_.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>(path, 1)))));
134  }
135 
137 
143  virtual void advertiseService(const std::string& service,
144  bool (IBlackBoxNode::*callb)(blackbox_control::Import::Request& req,
145  blackbox_control::Import::Response& res),
146  IBlackBoxNode* obj)
147  {
148  services_.push_back(node_handle_.advertiseService(service, callb, obj));
149  }
151 
157  virtual void advertiseService(const std::string& service,
158  bool (IBlackBoxNode::*callb)(blackbox_control::Export::Request& req,
159  blackbox_control::Export::Response& res),
160  IBlackBoxNode* obj)
161  {
162  services_.push_back(node_handle_.advertiseService(service, callb, obj));
163  }
165 
171  virtual void advertiseService(const std::string& service,
172  bool (IBlackBoxNode::*callb)(blackbox_control::Playback::Request& req,
173  blackbox_control::Playback::Response& res),
174  IBlackBoxNode* obj)
175  {
176  services_.push_back(node_handle_.advertiseService(service, callb, obj));
177  }
179
